name: energy-data-ch
title: Datasets related to Energy with a focus on Switzerland

fields.name: Verified
fields.description: True if information on this dataset has been community verified

fields.name: Organisation
fields.description: The current data owner or maintainer

fields.name: Type
fields.description: Whether this is a dataset, literature, code sample, etc.

fields.name: Link
fields.description: A webpage which describes the data and provides download URLs

fields.name: Example
fields.description: Any example applications or visualisations which illustrate this specific dataset

fields.name: Topic
fields.description: Any keywords, comma delimited, which help us to sort through the datasets. Include an ISO country code (ch, uk, ...), if it is country-specific.

fields.name: Permissions
fields.description: Brief description of the terms of use, along with detailed links to any License or such

fields.name: Formats
fields.description: List of data formats available, comma delimited

fields.name: Comments
fields.description: Further details related to format, content, or usage

fields.name: Contact
fields.description: Whom to contact for further information

contributors.title: Opendata.ch - Swiss chapter of Open Knowledge
